Html:
Hi Guys...

First... Congratulation by this application!!!! It will be the biggest tool to suport the WoW players.

So... What do you thing about put in the optimization the target level... For example:

A char in the 40 lvl.

What is the best equips for this char? (lvl 40)
What is the best equips for this char when up to lvl 50?

Thank you!!!

Well, the bottom line is that while support for all levels would be nice, it's a ton of extra work, and the usefulness of it is extremely tiny, so we aren't doing it. Theorycraft really doesn't matter pre-level cap, since reaching level cap is so easy.

In addition most gear <=70 is poorly itemized for todays mechanics and talents. Below 70 you should just try to max your Hit caps and then make sure you have enough health to survive and anything beyond that, spell power and attack power. Anything else diminishes so fast as you level up that its not worth tuning as long as you are levelling.
